hypotheses.title: Unusual Service Creation Detected
hypotheses.action: Investigate Sysmon Event ID 7045 for atypical service names or paths over the last 1h

sigma.yaml:
title: Unusual Service Creation
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
  category: process_creation
detection:
    selection:
      EventID: 7045
    condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=windows EventCode=7045 | stats count by ServiceName, ImagePath | search count>=2

methodologies_enriched.name: Windows Service
methodologies_enriched.description: Adversaries may create or modify Windows services to repeatedly execute malicious payloads as part of persistence. When Windows boots up, it starts programs or applications called services that perfor

hypotheses.title: Possible Credential Dumping Activity
hypotheses.action: Monitor for processes with command line containing 'mimikatz' or 'procdump' over 1h

sigma.yaml:
title: Potential Credential Dumping Tool Execution
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
  category: process_creation
detection:
    selection:
      EventID: 1
      CommandLine|contains:
        - 'mimikatz'
        - 'procdump'
    condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=windows EventCode=4688 | search ParentImage="*\\cmd.exe" CommandLine="*mimikatz*" OR CommandLine="*procdump*"

methodologies_enriched.name: LSASS Memory
methodologies_enriched.description: Adversaries may attempt to access credential material stored in the process memory of the Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS). After a user logs on, the system generates and stores a va

hypotheses.title: Unauthorized RDP Connection Attempts
hypotheses.action: Identify Event ID 4625 with LogonType 10 from uncommon source IPs over 1h

sigma.yaml:
title: Unauthorized RDP Connection Attempts
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
  category: logon
detection:
    selection:
      EventID: 4625
      LogonType: 10
    condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=windows EventCode=4625 LogonType=10 | stats count by IpAddress, AccountName | where count>=2

methodologies_enriched.name: Remote Desktop Protocol
